Package org.gridgain.grid.spi.loadbalancing.affinity

Contains affinity-based load balancing SPI.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
GridAffinityJob<A> Affinity job which extends GridJob and adds GridAffinityJob.getAffinityKey() method.
GridAffinityLoadBalancingSpiMBean Management bean for GridAffinityLoadBalancingSpi.
 

Class Summary
GridAffinityJobAdapter<A> Convenience adapter for GridAffinityJob interface that provides default implementation of GridJob.cancel() method and allows to add arguments.
GridAffinityLoadBalancingSpi Load balancing SPI which uses data affinity for routing jobs to remote nodes.
 

Package org.gridgain.grid.spi.loadbalancing.affinity Description

Contains affinity-based load balancing SPI. For more information on load balancing SPI see Load Balancing SPI on Wiki.
